channel.title: PowerShell on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on Some Title

item.title: Register multiple self-made styles in Word at once
item.description: It's convenient, but it's easy to register Microsoft Word styles in python. Execution image Character style is distinguished by background color + underline type Paragraph styles are distinguished by background color + border color The table is distinguished by the color of the outer border code As I wrote in another article,Iusepywin32tolookatthecurrentlyopendocumentandprocessit(WordVBAconstantsarehereArticleetc.). By default, a new style will be created based on “Formatting paragraph with cursor at runtime”.

item.title: Hit the ISE ERS API with PowerShell
item.description: #Introduction If you want to operate the API easily, I think that you often use cURL, Postman, HTTP Client provided in various programming languages, etc., but there are cases where such an environment cannot be prepared due to various restrictions. Is it not? In this post, we will introduce the API of Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) as a minimum to operate the REST API with a Windows terminal (PowerShell).
